Title: MediaBrowser Silverlight
Description:
MediaBrowser Silverlight is a small application designed with Silverlight in an educational purpose.
This application allows you to consult a series of media (Movies, Albums, Images, Books) and to administer them.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MediaBrowser Silverlight is a small application designed with Silverlight in an educational purpose.
This application allows you to consult a series of media (Movies, Albums, Images, Books) and to administer them.


This software provides simple functionalities, but allows to approach many of concept related to Silverlight like the methodology MVVM.


This project was designed with :
  • Visual Studio 2010
  • DotNet Framework 4.0
  • Silverlight 4.0
  • WCF
  • Expression Blend 4
  • Silverlight 4 Toolkit => http://silverlight.codeplex.com/
  • Adaptation of Mvvmhelpers developed by Mark Smith (Julmar Technology) => http://mvvmhelpers.codeplex.com/
  • Silverlight Cover Flow => http://silverlightcoverflow.codeplex.com/
  • WpfBookControls developed by Mitsu Furuta (Microsoft France) => http://mediabrowserwpf.codeplex.com/
  • Unity => http://unity.codeplex.com/

Please note, this project uses the library Solid Framework you must download at this address in order to compile the project : http://www.soliddocuments.com/fr/download.htm?product=SolidFramework

For more details, some articles about this application on my French blog : http://www.sebastien-alves.fr/?s=Media+Browser+Silverlight

Author's Blog : http://www.sebastien-alves.fr
